name: Touching Wood
description:
IMPORTANT

The game requires really high skill and knowledge in quantum physics.

Presentation

Made in August 2019 for the Pizza Jam #5.

It was my sixth game jam.

The theme was "Make a game based on the name of one of the horses from this list: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Irish_Triple_Crown_race_winners".

Tools

Gamemaker Studio: 2, Aseprite, Bosca Ceoil.

Credits

I did everything by myself during the jam, except:

- Font 2012 Moon Child Sans

Gameplay

You can use PageUp and PageDown to resize the window.

You only need the left click.

Tips (spoiler)

- Focus and good luck.
